content: in next ch5 space ch5 around join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 21 = csdc double_crochet the next three stitches together this is a dc3tog ch6 single_crochet in next ch5 space twice ch6 single_crochet in ch1 space 2dc ch1 2dc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch1 space ch6 single_crochet in next ch5 space twice ch6 dc4tog double_crochet all four of the next four dcs together ch6 single_crochet in next ch5 space twice ch6 single_crochet in ch1 space 2dc ch1 2dc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch1 space ch6 single_crochet in next ch5 space twice ch6 around however for your very last ch6 of this round do a ch3 and then double_crochet into the top of the beginning stitch of this round this places your hook in the correct spot to start the next round round 22 = ch1 single_crochet around last double_crochet made ch6 single_crochet in next space three times ch6 single_crochet in ch1 space ch6 single_crochet in next space three times around however for your very last ch6 do a ch3 and then double_crochet into the first single_crochet of this round round 23 = ch1 single_crochet around last double_crochet made ch7 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch to beginning single_crochet round 24 = slip_stitch into first space 4dc picot 4dc in space 5sc in next space around join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch cut thread fasten weave in all ends block appropriately see blocking section
